TITLE: Provides for real property credit and special excess automotive fuel amount assistance fund for the low income home energy assistance program
COSPONSORS: LAFAYETTE, GREENE, BENJAMIN, TOWNS, BENEDETTO, PERRY; M-S: Cook, Mayersohn, McEneny, Robinson, Weisenberg
SUMMARY: Amd SS606, 1111 & 1148, Tax L; add S89-h, St Fin L; amd S97, Soc Serv L Provides for real property circuit breaker credit and special excess automotive fuel amount assistance fund for additional funding to the low income home energy assistance program.

TITLE: Requires persons under eighteen to maintain good attendance at school to be eligible for a learner's permit or driver's license, unless exempt
SUMMARY: Amd S502, V & T L; add S3210-a, Ed L Requires persons under eighteen to maintain good attendance at school to be eligible for a learner's permit or driver's license, unless exempt; directs school authorities to issue and withdraw certificates of good attendance as warranted; applies to all schools, public or private; authorizes a fee of $20 per certificate.

TITLE: Provides that one of every one hundred metered parking spaces in the city of New York shall be designated as a handicapped parking space
SUMMARY: Add S1203-h, V & T L Provides that one of every one hundred metered parking spaces in the city of New York shall be designated as a handicapped parking space.

TITLE: Provides that no person seven years of age or over shall be a passenger in the back seat of a motor vehicle unless such person is restrained by a safety belt
COSPONSORS: LAFAYETTE, DINOWITZ, GALEF, MAYERSOHN, BENEDETTO, ESPAILLAT, FIELDS; M-S: Brennan, Cook, Gottfried, Greene, Hooper, Jeffries, John, Magnarelli, Maisel, Pheffer, Weisenberg
SUMMARY: Amd S1229-c, V & T L Provides that no person sixteen years of age or over shall be a passenger in the back seat of a motor vehicle unless such person is restrained by a safety belt approved by the commissioner of motor vehicles.

TITLE: Provides that photo images of a licensee contained on a renewal license shall be filed for no more than one year from the date of renewal
COSPONSORS: LAFAYETTE, REILICH, POWELL, LAVINE, KOON, FIELDS, ROBINSON, GALEF, PERALTA, BENJAMIN; M-S: Colton, L. Diaz, Dinowitz, D. Gordon, Markey, Mayersohn, Millman, Pheffer, Titus, Weisenberg
SUMMARY: Amd S504, V & T L Provides that photo images of a licensee contained on a renewal license shall be filed for no more than one year from the date of renewal.
